name: a brass lantern
desc: It's full of flammable kerosene. Kind of bad for the environment. Oh well.

name: a sandwich
desc: You begin to get hungry staring at it. Maybe you should put it away.

name: a shiny key
desc: It's... a key. I'm not sure what you expected from it. It is pretty shiny though.

name: a door
desc: It's locked. There's a keyhole, though.
